verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration 's surgeon general , Jerome Adams ,] [V: intervened] [ARGM-ADV: on board] [ARG1: a Delta Airlines flight Wednesday from Atlanta to Jackson , Miss. ,] [ARGM-PRP: to help a passenger having a medical emergency] .

[ARG0: The Trump administration 's surgeon general , Jerome Adams ,] intervened on board a Delta Airlines flight Wednesday from Atlanta to Jackson , Miss. , to [V: help] [ARG1: a passenger having a medical emergency] .
